abstract: A federal judge says he is leaning toward the hedge fund magnate David Einhorn’s contention in a lawsuit that Apple violated securities regulations by improperly bundling several shareholder proposals into one matter.
snippet: A federal judge says he is leaning toward the hedge fund magnate David Einhorn’s contention in a lawsuit that Apple violated securities regulations by improperly bundling several shareholder proposals into one matter.

headline.main: Court Gives Investor an Edge in a Lawsuit Against Apple
headline.print_headline: Court Gives Investor an Edge In a Lawsuit Against Apple

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
